entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ApplyStyleSheets() Causes Exception: System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute #28235
  • Add tests for Keyboard Scrolling Crash #28234
  • Build is failing when it doest find Simulator #28227
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28226
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Need to provision sign identities on Devdiv Mac's #28222
    Backlog
  • NavigatedFromEventArgs internal properties #28218
  • I9 - Changing the snap point value to Mandatory Single would affect performance on scrolling of other pages. #28213
  • Using CollectionView.EmptyView results in an Exception on Windows #28212
  • [Windows] The Slider and Stepper control does not work in One-Way binding mode with a MultiBinding Converter #28208
  • Build error nightly - Skiasharp - 9.0.50-ci.main.25155.2 #28207
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Add BackgroundImage to Tabbar #28205
  • CultureInfo.DisplayName incorrect on MAUI iOS (Android is ok.) #28204

Closed

  • Android - Navigation Title disappears if Flyout is set to a new window #21645
    Backlog
  • [9.0 SR4 Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28130
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Keyboard Scrolling Crash #28140
    .NET 9 SR5
  • MauiEnableXamlCBindingWithSourceCompilation = true + RelativeSource + TapGestureRecognizer does not work #28220
  • Role is not defined for "Balance, personal, Fitness, family and Friends" present in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Project _ScreenReader #27428
    .NET 9 SR5
  • After applying orientation "Family and Friends" project data is not visible: A11y_.NET 9 template_ Project _Orientation #27426
    .NET 9 SR5
  • After applying orientation "Clear all" button is not visible and data present besides to Pie chart is truncating.:A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Orientation #27421
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Binding a text property to the Label affects the scrolling performance on mac #17755
  • Clipping elements in MAUI leads to a degradation in scrolling performance. #19135
  • Very bad performance in net8 compared to net7 when creating views at runtime #19229
  • Similar name is provided for delete button: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #27761
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Incorrect name is provided for "Add Task" button as "Add": A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #27734
    .NET 9 SR5
  • The information provided on mouse hover is not accessible for keyboard-only users: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Keyboard. #26799
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Tooltips Provided for the "Chart" are not descriptive enough: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Chart_Non text content. #26800
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Only color is used to show the data in the chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Use of Color. #26801
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Visual label/heading is not provided for the chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Labels or Instrunctions. #26802
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Project Section is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26815
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name is provided for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26816
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Incorrect role is provided tags, icons and Project options as text: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26817
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name is provided for Edit fields present in the task screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Proejct_Name Role Value. #26819
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Tags are not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26860
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Project option is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26861
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No Name is provided for "All color Delete button" in Categories and Tags screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Manage meta_Name Role Value. #26918
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No Name and Role is defined for Icons present in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value. #26912
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Incorrect name is defined for Plus(+) button in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26898
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name is defined for All cleared button in Task section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26896
    .NET 9 SR5
  • For checkboxes present under tasks section ‘Analyze survey results, Develop action plan……” Labels are not associated with check box control”: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Labels or Instructions. #26938
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Talkback is not announcing labels for Name, Description, Category edit fields in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Labels or Instructions. #26911
    .NET 9 SR5
  • On applying resize(Text Size), Save button is getting truncated in Projects screen”: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Resize. #26914
    .NET 9 SR5
  • On applying Resize(Text size) in Projects section "Family and friends card text" is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26906
    .NET 9 SR5
  • On applying Resize(Text size) "Organize a Friends Get together" list item in task section is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26899
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Talkback is not announcing Selected or deselected for work, personal, health, family and friends buttons in tags section: A11y_.NET 9 template_Project_Screen reader. #26940
    .NET 9 SR5
  • In New project screen Name, category and description fields are not accessible with talkback: A11y_.NET 9 template_Hambureger-Projects Options_Screen Reader. #26916
    .NET 9 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the version of SkiaSharp used by SVG #28233
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28232
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update with final preview2 versions #28231
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28230
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix issue not provision sign identities on Devdiv Mac's #28229
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 #28228
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2
  • [Testing] Moved ImageDoesNotLeak test case from Device Test to UI Test #28223
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the OneWayBinding issue with MultiBindingConverter on Slider and Stepper Value #28219
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion
  • Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28217
    community ✨
  • Fixed content update issue when changing the ControlTemplate at runtime for a ContentPage #28216
    community ✨, area-controls-pages, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enable UITest Issue18193 on MacCatalyst #28210
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #28209
    area-navigation, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28189
    p/0, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 4 #28105
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [test] Run Android device tests on linux #28192
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling

Updated

  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed crash in CollectionView on iOS when updating grouped data. #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - UI Test #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116
    platform/android 🤖, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Simplify test projects and fail faster #27517
    area-testing, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loader Appears Frozen When Used with Shell TabBar - fix #27348
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, area-refreshview
  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [CollectionView] Crash occurs when switching CollectionView.IsVisible right after setting ItemsSource #28194
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Made sudo optional for Linux jdk provisioning #28195
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5
  • Replace deprecated iOS OpenUrl #28160
    area-blazor, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Trimming][PoC] Make it possible to trim controls and handlers #28115
    t/app-size
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-gestures
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android & iOS] PopToRootAsync for modal pages - improvements #26851
    community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label Visibility Issue on macOS and iOS #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #27502
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix RightToLeft is not working for Shell #28161
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [Android] Android: Native View not set exception on modal page - fix #28200
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • Implement iOS secondary ToolbarItems #28185
    t/breaking 💥, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android, iOS] - Flyout icon should remain visible when a page is pushed onto a NavigationPage or Shell page with the back button disabled. #28187
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed SearchHandler Keyboard does not dismiss when unfocus #28186
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
